documents.document: RT @BePositiveQ: Live healthy and think healthy. Believe in your ability to achieve. Don't dwell on negative thoughts.
There are three truths in life: you are born, you will die, and things change. -Entropy (1999)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the anxiety in my life: http://t.co/jQ1zWXwOSq
To give and not expect anything in return, that is what lies at the heart of love. -An Ideal Husband (1999)
RT @Motivated_Self: Always go the extra mile. Believe in the positivity of your future. Stay focused on your goals.
You know what John Lennon always said? Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans. -Fired Up! (2009)
I guess sometimes the past just catches up to you, whether you want it to or not. -The Green Mile (1999)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the distracting negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
There is no certainty, only opportunity. -V for Vendetta (2005)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the depressing negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
When you want something in life, you just gotta reach out and grab it. -Into the Wild (2007)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Stay determined. Never back down. Stay focused on happiness.
I loved the way a photo could capture a moment before it was gone. -The Lovely Bones (2009)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the numbing negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Memory is a wonderful thing if you don�t have to deal with the past. -Before Sunset (2004)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Never let anyone keep you down. Focus on your dreams. Never ever give up.
Most things dont work out as expected, but what happens instead often turns out to be a good stuff. -The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel (2012)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the soul-destroying negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
The more you know who you are and what you want, the less you let things upset you. -Lost in Translation (2003)
RT @PositivesQuote: Stay focused on what truly matters. Believe in the possibility. Believe in the possibility.
There is no past that we can bring back by longing for it. -The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel (2012)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the energy-sapping negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
It doesn't matter how this looks to other people. If this is something that you got to do, then you do it. -Rocky Balboa (2006)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Overcome your fears. Stay focused on the positive. Love your life.
You got to approach every day as if it's your last. -Lords of Dogtown (2005)
The worth of a life is not determined by a single failure or a solitary success. -The Emperor's Club (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the paralyzing negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
RT @PositivesQuote: Love every single moment of life. Fear nothing. Work for your ambitions.
That's the beauty of the world, there's always something to put your life into. -A Prairie Home Companion (2006)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the disgusting negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Every shadow, no matter how deep, is threatened by morning light. -The Fountain (2006)
RT @BePositiveQ: Avoid negative habits. Embrace yourself. Believe in the possibility.
Happiness is a gift. And the trick is not to expect it, but to delight in it when it comes. -Nicholas Nickleby (2002)
The last thing to age in somebody is their heart. -Rocky Balboa (2006)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the gloomy feelings in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
There are three sides to every story. My side, your side, and the truth. -The Kid Stays in the Picture (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the gloominess in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
You cannot find peace by avoiding life. -The Hours (2002)
RT @Motivated_Self: Stay positive no matter what. Focus on your own dreams. Believe in your hopes.
Whatever you do, make it mean something to you. -Barbershop (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the gloom in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
What does it mean to regret something when you have no choice? -The Hours (2002)
RT @PositivesQuote: Be your own motivation. Love every aspect of life. Love every aspect of life.
Our love is like the wind. I can�t see it but I sure can feel it. -A Walk to Remember (2002)
You can�t control the things that happen to you but you can control the way you react to them. -You Again (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the hostility in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
What�s the point of being bad when there�s nothing good to stop you? -Megamind (2010)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Life is incredibly beautiful. Focus on your own life. Stay away from negativity.
Maybe we never really know how good we have it, until it�s gone. -Megamind (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the hate in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
The bad days sometimes make the good days better. -How Do You Know (2010)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Always stay focused. Live healthy and think healthy. Avoid negativity.
Our job is improving the quality of life, not just delaying death. -Patch Adams (1998)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negativism in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
If you focus on the problem, you can�t see the solution. Never focus on the problem. -Patch Adams (1998)
RT @PositivesQuote: Avoid distractions. Motivate yourself. Stay determined.
The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success. -Tomorrow Never Dies (1997)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negativeness in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Worry is like interest paid in advance on a debt that never comes due. -The Spanish Prisoner (1997)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Stay hungry. Love your life in all of its beauty. Your future is yours, make it happen.
A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow. -Wag the Dog (1997)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the self-doubt in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
You can't relate to other people, so you fill your life with stuff. -Ghost World (2001)
RT @Fight4YouDream: Believe in the possibility. Ambition keeps you alive and motivated. Your life is yours to live.
Love is a bridge built between two people. -America's Sweethearts (2001)
Dying is something you have no control over. Why waste your life being afraid of it? -K-PAX (2001)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the pessimistic feelings in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Stay focused on what matters to your heart. Work hard. Work hard for what you love.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us. -Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the pessimism in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
You know what the scariest thing is? To not know your place in this world. To not know why you�re here. -Unbreakable (2000)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Chase all of your dreams. Believe in yourself. Believe in your life.
The key to a great story is not who, or what, or when, but why. -Tomorrow Never Dies (1997)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative tension in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
You got to learn to laugh, it's the way to true love. -Michael (1996)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Be in love with your life. Save yourself, don't wait for others to save you. Crave happiness.
Never give up on someone you love, no matter what they do. -The Claim (2000)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the unhealthy tension in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSNcPT
Whatever happens, if you act from the heart, you can't make a mistake. -Tin Cup (1996)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Be your own inspiration. Life is incredibly beautiful. Be positively ambitious.
Choices are like connecting highways. They all take you to same place. Some just take longer to get there. -Dream for an Insomniac (1996)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the distress in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
I don't believe there's such a thing as actions without consequences. -Mary Reilly (1996)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Open your eyes, your life is full of positives. Focus on your own ambitions. Wake up inspired.
In a relationship, it is better to be the leaver than the leavee. -Everyone Says I Love You (1996)
Why does everybody think conflict is so bad? There are a lot of good things coming out of conflict. -Before Sunrise (1995)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the unhealthy relationships in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Every woman is a mystery to be solved. -Don Juan DeMarco (1995)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the horrible negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Look inside yourself. You are more than what you have become. Remember who you are. -The Lion King (1994)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Be bold. Focus on your dreams and ambitions. Stay positive.
Perfection is not just about control, it is also about letting go. -Black Swan (2010)
The only person standing in your way is you. -Black Swan (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the nasty negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Life is a journey that goes round and round, and the end is closest to the beginning. -I'm Still Here (2010)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Focus on your goals. Be goal-oriented. Always be positive.
The opportunities of most people are determined by forces they don't even see. -Che: Part One (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative feelings in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
"�We�re all going the same way. We�re just taking different roads to get there, that�s all."" -The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)"
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Achieve your goals. Believe in your destiny. Believe in your destiny.
